name: QLPreviewReplyAttachment
desc: An attachment for a Quick Look preview reply that provides additional content for the system to display a preview.

items.name: init(data: Data, contentType: UTType)
items.desc: Creates a preview reply attachment with the specified type.

items.name: var contentType: UTType
items.desc: The content type of the preview attachment.

items.name: var data: Data
items.desc: The data of the preview attachment.
